text_block_list.text:
I wonder which flavor of shaved ice I should get～♪ It's summer 
after all, so maybe pineapple? Kiwi flavor sounds interesting too～
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
Awww, they all sound good! Trainer-san, 
I'm going to go take a closer look at the menu!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
I was at summer training camp with Smart Falcon. 
Today we were taking a break, and we had been making 
good progress on the training menu, but―

Haa～…… it's finally summer training camp but, 
dirt, dirt, dirt…… I'm allllways surrounded by dirt……
text_block_list.name: Dirt Aptitude Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
I heard a big sigh. When I turned to look, I saw an Uma Musume by 
herself, poking at the dirt. I felt like I had seen her before……

Trainer-san, I'm back☆ I decided on going 
with the electrifying Hawaiian Blue flavor today♪
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
――But then Smart Falcon had returned, 
and we went to buy some shaved ice.

Huuu～……! Looking good, huh!? 
Maybe it was because of that tasty shaved ice――
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
……Hm? What's going on? 
Looks like there's a lot of people gathering over there.
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
To figure out what happened, I went with Smart Falcon 
to where people were gathering. When we did―
What should I do, what should I do……!?
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
One trainer was panicking, and just like us, 
several other trainers and Uma Musume had gathered 
together due to his panicked voice.
……I wonder what happened.
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
As she said, we didn't know the situation. 
I decided to ask the trainers gathered there.

I-it's a disaster……! The girl I'm responsible for hasn't 
returned, even though it's long past the end of her break time……!
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
On top of that, it seems like he can't get in 
touch with her either. It's going to be getting 
dark soon, too. She might get lost……
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
No way……! Then we need to find her quickly! 
Right, Trainer-san!?
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
choice_data_list: Yeah, we want to help find her
Yeah, we want to help find her

text_block_list.text:
Good call, standing around here won't solve anything. Let's split 
up and search. Do you have any idea where she might head to?
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text: Yeah! Thank you……! Umm, maybe―
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Everyone was assigned a location to check, and the search began 
in earnest. The place assigned to us was―

The opposite end of the beach, huh. 
There aren't many people here though……
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
choice_data_list: That doesn't mean she isn't here
That doesn't mean she isn't here

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it happens pretty often. 
You just wanted to take a walk and ended up straying too far.
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
Alllright! Since this is our spot, we just need to go all out and 
search! Falco will go take a look way over there. Since I'm good 
at running in the sand-!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon was overflowing with motivation, 
and she had already run so far away before I could stop her.
Haa…… Haa…… Haa……!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
(Is she over here? Or maybe over there? 
Uuu……I ran off before thinking about it and now I have no idea)
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
(But, since I decided to do it, I need to do my best……! 
Full Throttle☆Full Power! Falco, Ooo!)
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
Eh, Falco-san……? 
Why's she running out here……?
text_block_list.name: Dirt Aptitude Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
After that, I had been walking around for quite a while, 
and I couldn't find the missing girl or Smart Falcon.

How's it looking over here……!? 
I've looked all around the beach, but still haven't found her……
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
I see…… 
Damnit, where should I look next……!?
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Time continued to pass as we still had no clues. We needed to 
find her before the sun went down. When I started thinking that―
Sorry・For・The・Waitーーーーーー!!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
Coming back straight to your heart☆Even if she runs, make sure to 
catch her♪ It's the strongest Umadol, Smart Falcon☆
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
She must have run quite a bit because she was 
covered in dirt when she came back. ……Behind her, 
was probably the girl we were looking for.

Oh come on, Trainer-san, 
not calling me 『Falco』 right there is a no-no☆
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
Ehehe…… sorry about that, I didn't mean to worry 
you. I just thought 『Go full power!』 and ran 
off without really thinking about it.
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
It seems like the missing girl had gotten really lost. 
The only reason we found her was because of Falco.

I just finished changing clothes and it's already night, huh…… 
I was hoping to get in just a little bit more training though.
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: Falco-san…… hey!
text_block_list.name: Dirt Aptitude Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
Waaah, what, what!? 
―Oh, huh? You're……
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
We swung those flags together a while ago……! My 
aptitude is dirt too…… this whole time I had a hard 
time accepting that, my own aptitude I mean.
text_block_list.name: Dirt Aptitude Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
But, after watching Falco-san today…… it was the first time I 
thought 『This isn't so bad』! Watching Falco-san run through the 
sand, you were sparkling……!
text_block_list.name: Dirt Aptitude Uma Musume

text_block_list.text: She gave her thanks to Smart Falcon and then ran off.

………… 
……her eyes were sparkling, weren't they?
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
To think she'd look at Falco with eyes like that…… 
―Ehehe, do you think I've gained a fan?
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
The people doing the performing were all working hard and 
shining, and the people watching were basking in that, I think!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
It's a reaaaaally wonderful thing, don't you think!? Falco too, 
it would be great if I could shine like that for someone too♪
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
As long as you give it your all, it really doesn't matter what 
you do, huh? ……Alllright! Then, to celebrate the birth of Fan#2♪
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
The unveiling of a new incredibly lovely, cute smile♪ 
It's the strongest Umadol～, Smart Falcon☆
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
Whenever she decides on something, she works hard on it. 
She was really reliable, and outstanding―

――C'mon, Trainer-san! You're supposed to say 『Cute』, aren't you!? 
Okay, one more time! I want a do over～～!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
